featured.text: Other groundbreaking products, including Omega-3 capsules, cold virus pretreatment sprays, and dog snacks are made from what was once cod catch detritus.

definition.zh_def: 預處理，指在主要處理過程之前進行的準備性處理。
definition.en_def: Pretreatment refers to the preparatory process that occurs before the main treatment.
definition.example: The samples underwent pretreatment to remove impurities before analysis.
